ngiemboon: À kaa wɔ́ɔn guu táʼ, mèŋ n ge meen gʉa.
en: He didn't invite me, but I'm going to go anyway.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ m pfɛ́ɛ páʼɔɔn, ḿmeen meen.
en: I eat like that, despite (my will).

ngiemboon: N ka gyá nnú, é kÿo ḿmíte tsɛ̀ɛ megǐ.
en: I saw the snake, it fled to slip through the grass.

ngiemboon: Nzèm sǐŋ, à mmó tepòŋ giŋ.
en: When it's dark, the monster walks.

ngiemboon: À gɔ̌ɔn ne fɛ̌ we ngie aa ngàŋa mmóm.
en: He told his brother that he is a snob (ambitious).
